A dataset (and the code used to get it) about footballers playing in the following leagues (during the 17/18 season):

- Premier League (England)
- Championship (England)
- League One (England)
- League Two (England)
- 1.Bundesliga (Germany)
- LaLiga (Spain)
- Serie A (Italy)
- Ligue 1 (France)

## Usage

Repo contains a .R file, `scrape_footballers`, containing all code used to scrape player data for the leagues mentioned above (for the current season)
